text: long long int a [ 1000 ] [ 500 ] , m [ 1000 ] [ 500 ] ; long long int max ( long long int a , long long int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; return b ; } int main ( ) { long long int t , n , i , j , k , l , r , c ; scanf ( "%lld" , & t ) ; for ( k = 1 ; k <= t ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( l = 1 ; l <= n ; l ++ ) m [ n ] [ l ] = a [ n ] [ l ] ; for ( r = n - 1 ; r >= 1 ; r -- ) { for ( c = 1 ; c <= r ; c ++ ) { m [ r ] [ c ] = a [ r ] [ c ] + max ( m [ r + 1 ] [ c ] , m [ r + 1 ] [ c + 1 ] ) ; } } printf ( "%lld\n" , m [ 1 ] [ 1 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
